name: ProductCatalogParameterRel
comment: Maintains the values and other characteristics for a specific property, independent of product catalog version. Examples of parameters include:* Rate of price plan* Data allowance as part of plan * Voice allowance as part of planIf C1 D1 is source, the entity also contains parameters belonging to product category (product specfication type and product offering type).
vf short description: Maintains the values and other characteristics for a specific property, independent of product catalog version.

fields.name: ProductCatalogParameterRelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductCatalogParameterRelKey
fields.comment: The product category to which this parameter belongs. Generated Key based on Product Catalog Key, Product Category Key,  Product Parameter Key, Product Parameter Rel Type Ind

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the effective date of the relationship between product catalog items parameters.

fields.name: ProductParameterSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the end date of the relationship between product catalog items parameters.

fields.name: Value
fields.comment: Indicates the property value for a product catalog item.

fields.name: CurrentFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the relationship between product catalog and product parameter is currently active.Values are:- 1 - The relationship is currently active.- 0 - The relationship is currently not active.

fields.name: PropertyId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the properties in this source system. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.nameFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.nameFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.id

fields.name: PackageName
fields.comment: Indicates the package name for the item parameter.

fields.name: ParameterDimensionInd
fields.comment: Indicates the dimension for the item parameter. For example, Scale, Period, Frequency, and so on.

fields.name: ParameterUnitOfMeasurementInd
fields.comment: Indicates the UOM for an item parameter. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.unitOfMeasureFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.unitOfMeasureFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.unitOfMeasure

fields.name: ItemRoleInd
fields.comment: Indicates the item role.

fields.name: RevenueTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductParameterRelTypeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the source of the product parameter.For example:- SOC - SOC Property- PRIT - EPC Extract Offer DetailsFor C1D1 the values are PO when source is Product Offering PS when source is Product Specification POT when source is Product Offering Type PST when source is Product Spec Type PO when source is Product Offering PS when source is Product Specification POT when source is Product Offering Type PST when source is Product Spec Type

fields.name: ProductCatalogId
fields.comment: Identifies the product catalog item in the source system. For Product OfferingproductOffering.idFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.id

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CatalogItemName
fields.comment: Stores the name of the catalog item

fields.name: CatalogVersionId
fields.comment: Stores the version of the product catalog

fields.name: ElementTypeInd
fields.comment: Stores the name of the catalog item

fields.name: ProductCatalogParameterDesc
fields.comment: Description of the product catalog parameter. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.description.value where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.description.locale = "en-US"For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.description.value where productSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.description.locale = "en-US"For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.description.value where characteristicsList.characteristic.description.locale = "en-US"

fields.name: ConfigurableFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if parameter is configurable. For Product OfferingIf productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.configurable = true then 1 else 0 For Product SpecificationIf productSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.configurable = true then 1 else 0 For Product Catalog TypeIf characteristicsList.characteristic.configurable = true then 1 else 0

fields.name: ProductCatalogParameterValueTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the value type of parameter ex. String, numeric, money and so on. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.valueTypeFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.valueTypeFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.valueType

fields.name: MinimumCardinalityValue
fields.comment: Indicates the minimum cardinality of parameter. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.minCardinalityFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.minCardinalityFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.minCardinality

fields.name: MaximumCardinalityValue
fields.comment: Indicates the maximum cardinality of parameter. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.maxCardinalityFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.maxCardinalityFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.maxCardinality

fields.name: ExpiredForSalesFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the parameter relationship is expired for sale. For Product OfferingIf productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.expiredForSales = true then 1 else 0 For Product SpecificationIf productSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.expiredForSales = true then 1 else 0 For Product Catalog TypeIf characteristicsList.characteristic.expiredForSales = true then 1 else 0

fields.name: DefaultValueInd
fields.comment: Indicates the default value of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.maxCardinalityFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.maxCardinalityFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.maxCardinality

fields.name: DefaultValueName
fields.comment: Indicates the default value name of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.value where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.value whereproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.value where characteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.default = true

fields.name: DefaultValueUomInd
fields.comment: Indicates the default value UOM of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.unitOfMeasure where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.unitOfMeasure whereproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.unitOfMeasure where characteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.default = true

fields.name: DefaultValueFrom
fields.comment: Indicates the default value from (in case of range) of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.valueFrom where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.valueFrom whereproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.valueFrom where characteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.default = true

fields.name: DefaultValueTo
fields.comment: Indicates the default value to (in case of range) of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.valueTo where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.valueTo whereproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.valueTo where characteristicsList.characteristic.characteristicValue.default = true

fields.name: DefaultValueType
fields.comment: Indicates the default value type of parameter if available. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.valueType where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.productOfferingCharacteristicValue.default = true For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.valueType whereproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.default = true

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
